name: Eh, Gravity
description:
Hi!, This is a game I've been working on for about 6 months. Its for my second year of Uni at staffs. Right now there isn't much to play and this is much more of a demo for play-testing some mechanics while looking for bugs.

Features one very very short level. Will be uploading future versions of this game, and hopefully a finished version with many more well designed and lengthy levels around April time :D.

Till then.
